name: Neo's Vault
description:
You are a test subject for the military. They want to turn regular teenagers into war machines. They realize you have incredible skill and have you go through their toughest courses to test your skill. You have an AI buddy, Lucy, to help you out with the stages, but she may not be who you think. 

DISCLAIMERS -

There is ONE message from the control center, so listen to it carefully.

THERE ARE NO CHECKPOINTS, so if you die, back to the beginning.
